website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a mid-sized option with superior sound and color quality, this is a reasonable choice, though it's not quite as budget-friendly.
pros: Exceptionally good sound for a mid-sized model with a reasonable price
We love the gorgeous color range that the Wide Color Enhancer Plus feature provides on both new and older non-HD programs
cons: Some owners of previous generation Samsung TVs feel that the picture quality is slightly less sharp, but the vivid color range compensates for this issue
Tech support is not always helpful

customer_reviews.title: Terrific TV
customer_reviews.text: This TV surpasses my expectations. I wanted a "dumb" TV and spent months doing research. I attached a Fire Stick and have access to all my programs without worrying about cybersecurity. The 1080p LED image is clear and sharp. I made some adjustments beause the default was a little too bright for my taste but made a few changes in the settings and WOW!
customer_reviews.author: MZ Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Solid LED TV
customer_reviews.text: As someone not interested in Smart TVs or 3D, this was a great choice for the price-point. Slightly 'older' TV sets seem to always be better purchases price/value wise. Real happy with it! Replaced a 28" set so feels like a real nice upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: poor picture
customer_reviews.text: poor picture we made every adjustment possible, that did make the picture better but still poor quality if we watched a sporting event it was almost impossible to see the score , time ect. All text was blurry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV - Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before deciding on the Samsung 40" TV. One thing I was looking for was easy set up. IT WAS!!!!! Literally took me a total of about 20 minutes (and that was getting it up multiple flights of stairs and unpacking) from start to finish. Very easy. Worked immediately, was packaged nicely, and the picture looks great (with a bit of fine tuning). Easy "sleep" timer as well. I'm already thinking about changing out all of my TV's for Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: If you're just looking for a great TV for a decent price this is great
customer_reviews.text: If you're just looking for a great TV for a decent price this is great. I had worries about the people complaining about the sound, but have been pleasantly surprised. As long as you aren't planning on hosting movie viewings you should be fine. I've never had to turn the volume over 25-30%.
customer_reviews.author: Dan M.

customer_reviews.title: This TV has been really good to me
customer_reviews.text: This TV has been really good to me. It's been a year and a half and is still excellent for my PS4 and my computer, where I play games, watch movies/shows, do video editing, work with DAW's and other software, and just leaving it in movie mode for everything looks and performs great. I would subtract a star for the horrible audio, if not for the fact that I always use headphones... but it does have horrible audio and I should subtract a star for that, but I'm kind of OCD and don't want to jynx the TV.
customer_reviews.author: JAC_83

customer_reviews.title: Samsung UN40H5003 40-Inch 1080p LED TV (2014 Model) - Good!
customer_reviews.text: I had this for some time now. I've already gotten my money's worth IMHO. But, of course, I want to keep using it 'trouble-free! I don't know anything about 'smart features'. The stand is nice and sturdy. The remote control menu works quite well, having lots of detailed tweaks if desired. The price point was what convinced me to buy this. I like it quite a bit. The picture is very rich and vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ratts

customer_reviews.title: great tv for a decent pricepoint
customer_reviews.text: Spent a few days looking for a tv to replace my parents living room LCD that finally gave out after 6 yrs, this LED tv fit the requirements pretty well. Its hard to find any large HD LED tvs that have composite connections built in anymore, because they still periodically use their dvd players and older peripherals, so it was the number one requirement. Its a shared component/composite input, but at least it has the functionality. Great picture and sound as well, plus a very sleek look.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Cortez

customer_reviews.title: So far so good..
customer_reviews.text: So far so good........ good picture, the sound is a little tinny if you take the base off.. easy set up, was able to program Comcast remote to it. I think for the price, it was a good purchase, we will see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Kirkland WA

customer_reviews.title: Great TV... But its not a Smart TV!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new TV.... The only draw back is that it is not a Smart TV.. But I still love it.. Th picture quality is great and sound is also very good.. The setup was easy and took me like 10 mins to attach it to its base stand and it was good to go... When I first received this, it was a damaged TV and had green lines all over the screen. We contacted Amazon and they replaced the TV immediately and the replacement arrived the very next day... I connect my Laptop with the TV via HDMI cable and it works great...
customer_reviews.author: Chandni

customer_reviews.title: very good value
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time in good working order with no problems at all, which is the first 3 stars. Picture quality and lighting is very good and well defined. While there are cheaper alternatives to a 40 inch TV, I believe it was worth paying somewhat more for the Samsung brand, as this TV appears to look better than off-brand tvs I see in department stores The sound is good and well balanced with an equalizer to customize it. I would buy again and recommend Samsung and this seller
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture Excellent Sound
customer_reviews.text: I love my Samsung 40" HDTV. It is everything as described. Not easy to set up however. No instructions beyond how to attach the base. Once it was setup and programmed it worked fine. This is my first personal TV in over 20 years, so there is much I have yet to learn.
customer_reviews.author: MoxieGirl

customer_reviews.title: This is a great TV. I have had it for a year ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV. I have had it for a year now and it still works great. The image is very clear and the screen is the perfect size for a small living room.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bodling

customer_reviews.title: Did not get the model advertised.
customer_reviews.text: After having this TV mounted on a wall for some time, I ordered a surround sound system to use with it. After struggling to see the back of the TV, I have realized that I did not get the TV I ordered. In fact, I received a UN39EH5003FXZA. This would not have been a problem except, this model has NO AUDIO OUTPUT options at all, unlike the TV I was supposed to have received. I have now spent money on a surround sound system that I can't hook up to my TV.
customer_reviews.author: S. A.

customer_reviews.title: Good Picture--Came Cracked for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality. Sound isn't super, but OK. This was bought as a Christmas present for a family member, but the first TV was delivered on Christmas Even with a cracked screen. Amazon delivered another, but not in time for Christmas. Bummer. If you're ordering as a gift, plan for an extra week in case you need to return/replace. Amazon's return process was super easy and hassle-free.
customer_reviews.author: Ysobel Croix

customer_reviews.title: We love our Samsung monitors!
customer_reviews.text: We are an Exhibit Builder, so in the past we had rented Monitors/DVD players/HDMI cables etc from the shows General Contractor for use in our customers Trade show exhibits. We finally decided that we wanted to make the rental $$$ instead, so we have been buying an inventory of equipment over the past couple of years. This monitor (and the other 10-12 as well) are all for that purpose. Not being used for TV watching per se, but to run DVD's or info on Flash Drives, for 6-8 per day of the show. We have had good success with these Samsung's and will continue to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Constant

customer_reviews.title: Overall a nice TV. Perfect size to have at the foot ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice TV. Perfect size to have at the foot of the bed. I primarily wanted to watch various shows from a USB thumb drive. It works well with every video format I've used so far. However if I watch something subtitled (like a a foreign show), the subtitles are horribly small and difficult to read. They don't appear the way they do on the computer. There is no way to make them bigger as far as I can tell. If anyone knows please tell me! Its not the end of the world; I can always hook my computer up to the TV, but I wish I would've known before I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: alchemyjelly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and straightforward menu
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and straightforward menu. Nice to have a TV without all the automatic crap and "smart" functionality. Hooked up my modded firestick to the back and have no problems. Colors are great after we configured them a little to our liking. Planning on updating the firmware soon to see what's new!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture/ sound a bit muffled
customer_reviews.text: Great T.V. Now all our T.v's are Samsung. I like the fact is doesnt make music when it turns on & off like our others do. The sound is a bit muffled because the speakers seem to be on the bottom of the t.v but we will get used to it for the price. Couldn't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie P. McCalmon

customer_reviews.title: great video and sound
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised, no problems at all, great video and sound. The videos and pictures that I cast from my phone, laptop or camera appear much more pleasant to me on it. I hope this one lasts better than the last Samsung I purchased, it died just after 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Tom T.

customer_reviews.title: Great 40" HDTV
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on Saturday,received on Monday!! Thank you Amazon Prime. This 40" replaces a 12 year old front projection 25" in one of our bedrooms. With Direct TV, HDMI cable,what a great picture. Samsung is my TV of choice with a great price, easy setup. Whoever visits will have great enjoyment out of this set. I highly recommend. When my 70" Sharp goes in our TV room, it will be replaced by a Samsung 4K Ultra HDTV.
customer_reviews.author: William R Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this TV
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this TV. After 2 years the video went out. I guess this is a disposable TV. I've had a Samsung as our first TV that is still being used after 15 years by another family member. I feel I should have at least gotten 5 years from this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Curtis

customer_reviews.title: I love my STV! (Samsung TV)
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV! I haven't had a new television set since 1998 - 2 analogue sets, one 36" Toshiba, the other a 19" Samsung. Obviously, I was long overdue for some updated technology!! I like the sound quality as well as the clear picture & true color of this Samsung. And since I'm a person of modest means, the reduced price was a selling point for me. I'm very happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a fancy television but offers a great picture and features for the price. Most often some economy grade displays have sound quality issues but this certainly is not one of them. Pleanty of high and low range without the need for a sound bar. For Hi Def viewing the refresh rate is more than sufficient. Most importantly the stand is stable and being a center column, offers some placement and swivel abilities that a "double legged" support limits. It has a slightly deeper case but when profile for wall mounting isn't of concern, the depth offers substance. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good experience with Samsung TVs
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this is a good TV for some, but this is the 3rd Samsung product we've had that was a lemon / came defective, or needed some goofy repair. A word to the wise: Google "samsung strobing" or "samsung flashing/flickering" before making a purchase. Samsung's upper end TVs are second to none, no doubt about that, but their lower cost one can be hit or miss quality wise. Since we decided to get something cheaper, we got an LG instead; so far no complaints. We might try Visio next time as well.
customer_reviews.author: ZankFrappa

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This TV has an excellent picture and sound. It was easy to install and fits our needs very well. The only thing that I did not like is the way the favorites function is configured, I find it to be not user friendly, but I am used to the Sharp remote and the way they do things. Over all I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: edward gannon

customer_reviews.title: original box in perfect condition, hooked up and running in 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping, original box in perfect condition, hooked up and running in 30 minutes. you get what you pay for with TV's, Samsung is a very good product. Beach Camera is a very good seller, I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Szafran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect TV
customer_reviews.text: Great TV and it is not smart which is a plus in my book. Very easy setup to ROKU or cable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: and works beautifully. No problems what so ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV about a year ago now, and works beautifully. No problems what so ever, I set it up using another commenters advice and was perfect. For the price range this TV is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My main concern was that the TV would come damaged after reading some reviews, but my TV was well wrapped and I've had it for a few weeks now and it works great! Despite some other reviews, I think the picture and color are great! If you're looking for a simple, affordable, and clear TV, get this one. I was going to get a smart tv but I've always found them to be slow and difficult to navigate so I got a chromecast with this TV instead and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: They are the best. I have one on each floor
customer_reviews.text: you can't beat Samsung for TV's. They are the best. I have one on each floor.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: It's a good TV for what it's worth
customer_reviews.text: It's a good TV for what it's worth. When I was shopping for a 40', I needed a composite input on it to play some oldschool videogames and what not. After a good hour or two of tinkering with the video settings (the defaults aren't the greatest and is why it loses a star), the picture is as good as can be with no significant lagging or whatever. There is also a game mode if you want one, although I personally just stick with the settings I set up for it. Overall great TV if you need that composite input, otherwise, go for something else cause you might save a buck.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great value for this price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality. Easy to set up. Every good thing written in other reviews is true. Great value for the money. I may buy another at this bargain price before they are snapped up.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A Furey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture clarity.
customer_reviews.text: The picture clarity on this tv is far superior than what we were expecting for the price. I would choose this tv again over a pricier one any day. Speakers on it are not the greatest in the world, but the picture is so great we don't mind. The interface is easy to use and understand.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!! This is the first TV i have ever own in my young life so far, and I cannot begin to describe how beautiful this simple TV is. It was a steal and works well. As a gamer, I play a lot of video games and it looks great on the screen. I am still figuring out how to set it to decent color, but other than that, it is a wonderful TV. If you are looking for a TV that is not a smart TV, this would be a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Viixen87

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set Up, Great Picture!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. Didn't want to mess with a "smart tv" just wanted a good hdtv. This one has a great picture and was easy for me to set up on my own. I am 66 and while it was a little awkward, I managed it by myself.
customer_reviews.author: SheilaMargaret

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the cabin to watch DVD's and am very pleased with it. Sharp, clear picture with excellent resolution. Easy to hang on the wall and connect to the other devices.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Salter

customer_reviews.title: great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I have now had this for 5 months and am completely satisfied. A great picture picture was my highest priority and I got it. I stream most things from my tablet with ChromeCast and am amazed at the great quality of the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The TV has been great. Don't need the Smart TV.
customer_reviews.author: Dick V

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect in his living room
customer_reviews.text: Bought this TV for my Dad. Fits perfect in his living room. Great picture and he loves his HD sports events now after 10 years with old style box tv. Unit was delivered promptly and set up was easy. I would definitely recommend this TV for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: ED E.

customer_reviews.title: Great picture. Very lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. Very lightweight. Reasonable number of inputs. More would be better, but the price is low. Best feature: You can play movies from a USB thumb drive in a wide variety of formats. MKV is what is usually used to rip BluRays and that works great. It has optical digital sound output to use your home theater equipment at original quality.
customer_reviews.author: Who Me?

customer_reviews.title: Great clear crisp picture
customer_reviews.text: After about six months I am still loving this tv. No issues or problems. Great clear crisp picture. The sound could be a bit better, but then it might just be me and the age thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy stand. Tv is great but it's a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy stand. Tv is great but it's a bit on the heavier side in my opinion. Great tv either way.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Thor

customer_reviews.title: UPS made sure she received it and then she very easily set it up and is pleased as punch with ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my cousin who lives in New York (I'm on West Coast) and is very non-tech, UPS made sure she received it and then she very easily set it up and is pleased as punch with quality of both picture and it's build.
customer_reviews.author: Nadoka

customer_reviews.title: Great size and purchase option!
customer_reviews.text: Love my purchase even year later... next time will upgrade to smart tv maybe...
customer_reviews.author: nicnac

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tv for the price. Yes, I bought "last year's model" but it was still new and had everything I needed. Not sure if it's my tv provider's fault, the remote I'm using (not the one that came with the tv) or the tv, but there's some lag time when changing channels. Great price for the size and features.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Paradise

customer_reviews.title: Defective TV / no replacement offered
customer_reviews.text: This reconditioned TV failed after 5 months, after return and exchange windows had closed. Strange red lines in moire patterns started appearing intermittently on the screen regardless of source (DVD / cable / antenna / Chromecast). A search on various online forums showed that this is a known issue with other Samsung TVs. Was very disappointed to receive no response to inquiry about replacing defective unit.
customer_reviews.author: Hopefiend

customer_reviews.title: Great color, great price
customer_reviews.text: Some ghosting during scenes with a lot of motion, but overall a great TV for a great price. Also fanstic color accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Man vs Plastic

customer_reviews.title: the picture is great and the sound is much better than I expected ...
customer_reviews.text: The tv is screwed firmly into the stand yet it still tilts slightly backward - it doesn't stand up completely straight in the stand. Huge bummer. makes it weird to watch. Hoping that the new stand they are sending me (for free) fixes the problem. Otherwise, the picture is great and the sound is much better than I expected it to be without a sound system.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Ford

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this TV about a year ago and it's great for bedrooms
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV about a year ago and it's great for bedrooms! it's not to big and not to small and I hooked up too about 4 consoles during this year and they all looked great on its LED display.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Wissman

customer_reviews.title: Straightforward TV
customer_reviews.text: Kitchen TV that works nicely on a wire shelf and has no stupid "smarts" that need constant upgrading. Used with DirecTV and Google Chrome sources.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: This TV is a little unique at times. The overall picture quality is great and the sound quality is superb. I do notice that when I turn off the playstation that I have hooked up to the HDMI port in the back, after it turns off and I get the standard "No signal" display, I am unable to use any function of the power control under the bottom right of the TV. Well, save for the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Parkinson

customer_reviews.title: Crisp view
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled. My last 40" was purchased Nov 2013 (off brand OCosmos) - Plugged this bad boy in and the picture was astonishing. Better speakers than the old one but I really feel all of the new TV industry has gone very cheap on speakers. I however have a Vizio sound bar that works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Debra M

customer_reviews.title: Died in 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV and it died 3 weeks after the warranty was up. I would hope to get more than 1 year out of a TV. I will never be buying another Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy C.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung 40"inch
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, excellent volume,just a few negatives. No screws for hanging on wall and the screws for the base were to small.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Katz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: as of today very pleased with tv. clear picture and fine tuning.
customer_reviews.author: abuelita

customer_reviews.title: I love Samsung tv
customer_reviews.text: I love this tv. The picture quality is great. The colors are vivid. The remote control works great. The volume works fine. This tv is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michellely

customer_reviews.title: I love the picture quality of this set but i am ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the picture quality of this set but i am having problems getting the sound to be as loud as my other set which is an LG. I have played the different sound features that are on this set but even at the highest sound setting it is not what i am used to.
customer_reviews.author: Jack P/Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase of this LED TV
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase of this LED TV. Have had for some time now and still very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Nicksic

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I am still using It since 5 years and It still looking great. I love It and i have 3 more. I would buy It over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Dania Marquez

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice tv. The picture quality is excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice tv. The picture quality is excellent, it's easy to set up and has all the necessary ports.
customer_reviews.author: Bette

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - Seller does not honor warranty
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this television in May 2018. It will randomly turn on and off. We contacted the seller and they will not do anything to replace or repair this television. We have only had it 8 months. It was supposed to have come with a one-year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The TV was as described. . The picture and colors are very good and the audio is very balanced. I would encourage friends to buy it. I also purchased a Samsung DVD player and the set up was very easy between the two.
customer_reviews.author: calalily

customer_reviews.title: Great TV!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tv! It shows why Samsung is so highly rated with a crystal clear picture and easy to put the stand on if you, like me, are mounting it on a wall. This is my 2nd Samsung and it probably won't be my last!
customer_reviews.author: Linda K.

customer_reviews.title: I've read that once this starts happened it will get progressively worse.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this TV for a little over a year now. It worked perfectly up until a few weeks ago when the screen started flashing/flickering every once in a while. I've read that once this starts happened it will get progressively worse.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Browner

customer_reviews.title: ... worried because of the price but it has a great picture. Lighter than expected and you just can't ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried because of the price but it has a great picture.Lighter than expected and you just can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Great for the technology challenged
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 80 year old mother. This is a basic tv. No smart features. Perfect for individuals that don't like battling with remotes and poorly thought out menus to watch tv.
customer_reviews.author: PPRO

customer_reviews.title: Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for a den... working flawlessly over a year later.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Staniforth

customer_reviews.title: For the money - Great small room T.V.
customer_reviews.text: T.V. is nothing special, used for a small apartment as a gift, the recipient loved it since she moved up from a 24 inch "monitor".... Does the job in usual Samsung fashion though - easy to setup, shipped really protected and all in all a nice setup.
customer_reviews.author: Zigmeister

customer_reviews.title: You're missing out on all the fun.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this awhile now and like most of Samsung's products, it's durable. The quality is perfect and the sound from it is smooth. Have no regrets! If you are thinking about it just do it!
customer_reviews.author: LisaDJAM

customer_reviews.title: Samsung is reliable
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for bedroom or other viewing. Easy set-up; arrived in good condition. Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Hard to beat for the price I paid. Easy to set up. Many months of trouble-free viewing. Yes, I'd recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TV!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this purchase. The picture is beautiful, clear, and crisp. The price is very good. I shopped around quite a bit so I feel that I got a GREAT TV for a reasonable price. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: I really like this TV. I bought it as an upgrade for the smaller screen Samsung I already had. I'm happy with it except for the upward screen tilt. I think I put the stand on correctly. I wonder if anyone else has this problem or is it just me.
customer_reviews.author: SallyKay

customer_reviews.title: ... can see a tv with ok sound and a great picture.
customer_reviews.text: And now I can see a tv with ok sound and a great picture .
customer_reviews.author: Turner.V

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't but again.
customer_reviews.text: Color is off unless you directly face screen. Not good from the site sides.
customer_reviews.author: Ginnywatts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great picture and color. I watch a lot of college football, and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vert pleased with return and buy again transaction
customer_reviews.text: Vert pleased with return and buy again transaction. TV is working and what we needed. Dont hesitate with this seller
customer_reviews.author: S.Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great movies of my choice with a great picture
customer_reviews.text: This TV is exactly what I wanted. No internet, no hassles, just plugged in the TV, my external hard drive, DVD player and poof! Great movies of my choice with a great picture.
customer_reviews.author: LynnD

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the space it is in!
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and decent sound, (have not hooked it up to amp and speakers yet). Picture was terrible with rabbit ears and digital converter, until I upgraded to a HD antenna.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Works well as PC Monitor via HDMI.
customer_reviews.text: I use mine as a PC monitor, it looks really good after a bit of tweaking of settings. The first one arrived broken, but I just shipped it back free of charge and ordered a second. For the record this is the second TV I've ordered from amazon and the first that arrived broken, I blame UPS not amazon. Amazon was very gracious in refunding my money almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Shook

customer_reviews.title: 40 " of dynamite TV.
customer_reviews.text: T V in my office just went 1st class. HD and what a picture.! It was worth every cent and " Prime Day " should come more often .
customer_reviews.author: ;Supply Ace"

customer_reviews.title: So very nice!
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful screen! No bells and whistles but works perfectly for our bedroom with a Blu-ray and Chromecast. Clear crisp picture with bright realistic color. Would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: RF Koster

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I received rmy new Samsung yesterday and am truly delighted. Setup was easy. The picture is great. I followed the settings suggested by Steve Paradis and am pleased with the result. The set is an excellent value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Tebben

customer_reviews.title: Samsung products are good quality
customer_reviews.text: I never bought a TV online. So I was a little nervous The TV has a great picture as expected and I think the price was fair. I think the vendor gets most of the credit for "as listed" quality.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Aitken

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my her quilting room
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes the TV. Works great in my her quilting room.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A nice clear picture and good color
customer_reviews.text: It met my expectations. A nice clear picture and good color. I like the size of the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Joan B. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great TV by Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Out of the Box the picture is great but you still have to tweak you're picture to you liking.
customer_reviews.author: EMAC7708

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect size, easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my brother to replace an old CRT tv when he got direct tv. He loves it. It is the perfect size, easy to set up, thin profile, and clear picture
customer_reviews.author: Cat J

customer_reviews.title: Great tv great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great tv. The sound is just fine without having to buy speakers or a sound bar. I just wish it had buttons on the actual tv. If you lose the remote you're kinda screwed. Overall I love t. Worth the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Yay for 1080p
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered in one piece, no dings or dents or cracked screens so thank god for that. The picture quality is great, we had a 720p beforw and when we started up the xbox with this TV my boyfriend and I both impressed by just how good the logo looked.
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Love this T.V!
customer_reviews.text: I love this T.V but the first one I ordered was defective. It was supposed to be brand new but had a dead pixel that was black. It was quite annoying on white backgrounds. I got a replacement and believe it or not, it was on the replacement as well. This time it was white, a bit smaller, and in the middle bottom of the screen opposed to the black one which was near the middle. So it's practically unnoticeable, and sometimes I forget it's even there. I've had mines for around half a year now. PROS: Clear and quality looks great. T.V turns off by itself when not in use after some time. CONS: Only 2 HDMI ports.
customer_reviews.author: Maria and Yami

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Usual excellent Samsung quality. Didn't need a smart tv, already had a Roku stick.
customer_reviews.author: fredstev

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the new TV, just the right size for our smaller den. Picture quality is excellent. Would certainly recommend this TV. Excellent dprice.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy N. Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Just got it set up, needed v or rectangular TV moun. Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: John Talon

customer_reviews.title: the visuals and colors from the television looked nice despite it being a 40-inch tv i had to ...
customer_reviews.text: the visuals and colors from the television looked nice despite it being a 40-inch tv i had to return it because it started making cackling noises but if you're willing to take the risk this is worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Very Positive Experience
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, easy set-up process, and excellent end-results make this model a great purchase. Yes, I would recommend this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Forman

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargain and great quality PIC
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality with decent features. Picture is crisp. Price was even better.
customer_reviews.author: Bill JoeWillie

customer_reviews.title: Has a small white bleed on top.
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is good for the price. Mine has a small white bleed on the top barely noticeable but still annoying on very dark scenes. Iam not sure what caused it, maybe from shopping or from the lcd manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Xander Kahn Hamdag

customer_reviews.title: Samsung 40"tv
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Very happy with item. Wish I had gotten bigger TV. Great picture. Just can't see paying 650.00 for the new Tv's that will be outdated in 6months. The down side of TV is the refresh rate isn't good on action programs.
customer_reviews.author: Larry M.
